commonsetpassword.the2factauth: The Two Factor Authentication to Secure your OPAL USP Account
commonsetpassword.becastropass: Because stronger passwords alone aren't enough to protect your account from password breaches. Add an extra layer of security to authenticate your login through any one of the following - Either your registered email address or Your registered Mobile Number.
